con:testCase.name: Create DOM Payment
con:testCase.con:description: create File payment for Non-crossBorder which cannot validate KYC

con:config.con:query: select * from RISK.RISK_CUSTOMER_COUNTRY where length(CUSTOMERID)='9' and COUNTRY_CODE='SE' and ROWNUM=1

select A.CUSTOMERID,A.ACCOUNTNUMBER,A.CUSTOMERTYPE,A.CUSTBANKID,A.CURRENCY from V_AUTHORISATION A where A.ROLETYPE = 'EIER'and CUSTOMERTYPE='N' and CUSTOMERID = ${RBS_Fetch Customer#ResponseAsXml#//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[1]/CUSTOMERID[1]} and A.ACCOUNTNUMBER IN (SELECT ACCOUNTNUMBER FROM V_AUTHORISATION where ROLETYPE = 'DISP' and CUSTOMERID = ${RBS_Fetch Customer#ResponseAsXml#//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[1]/CUSTOMERID[1]} ) fetch first 1 rows only

con:config.con:query: select TRANSACTIONSID, PAYMENTSTATUS, PAYMENTTYPE from TRANSACTIONS where ENDTOENDID in ('${Properties#EndtoEndID}')
select LOG_ID, BANK_ORG_ID, SOURCE_APPLICATION, LOGREF from EVENT_LOG where BUSINESSKEY='${FetchTransaction#ResponseAsXml#//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[1]/TRANSACTIONSID[1]}'
